short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to copy the clicked svg element to the clipboard!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is designed to copy the raw SVG code directly to the clipboard. - Works on elements (which are SVG's in the source) Let me know if there's any issues!
